remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至組件、 介面、 類別或結構。You can apply this attribute to an assembly, interface, class, or structure. 根據預設，通用語言執行平台將轉換成任何受管理的 Unicode 字元傳遞至 unmanaged 的方法執行時在 Windows 98 或 Windows me 上的 ANSI 字元By default, the common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 自動調整的對應可讓您選取關閉比對的字元完全相符項目存在時，interop 封送處理器。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to select a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 例如，封送處理器著作權將 Unicode 字元轉換為 'c' 之 unmanaged 方法接受 ANSI 字元。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. > [!CAUTION] > 某些字元缺少的自動調整的表示法。這些字元稱為無法對應。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 無法對應的字元通常會轉換成預設值 '？ 'ANSI 字元。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. 特定的 Unicode 字元轉換成危險的字元，例如反斜線 '\\' 字元，可以不小心變更路徑。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 提供兩個參數來控制方面的自動調整對應。 provides two parameters to control aspects of best-fit mapping. 您可以使用第一個參數來切換開啟和關閉自動調整的對應。You use the first parameter to toggle best-fit mapping on and off. 預設值是`true`，可讓組件、 介面和類別層級上的自動調整的對應。The default value is `true`, which enables best-fit mapping on the assembly, interface, and class levels. 套用至介面或類別的屬性會覆寫組件層級屬性。An attribute applied to an interface or class overrides an assembly-level attribute. 您同樣可以啟用或停用自動調整對應，平台叫用呼叫使用欄位。You can likewise enable or disable best-fit mapping for platform invoke calls by using the field. 平台所設定的值叫用欄位覆寫的所有層級。A value set by the platform invoke field overrides all levels of . 您可以使用控制擲回例外狀況，無法對應之字元的第二個參數。You can use the second parameter to control throwing an exception on unmappable characters. 預設值為欄位是`false`，擲回例外狀況每個的停用時間，執行階段遇到 Unicode 字元轉換成具有 '？ 'ANSI 字元。The default value for the field is `false`, which disables throwing an exception each time the runtime encounters a Unicode character that has to be converted to the '?' ANSI character. 即使自動調整的對應是`true`，無法對應的字元會產生例外狀況時欄位是`true`。Even if best-fit mapping is `true`, unmappable characters generate an exception when the field is `true`. 此功能來加強安全性，您可以切換的第一個參數`false`及第二個參數`true`。To tighten security, you can toggle the first parameter to `false` and the second parameter to `true`. 此參數設定的組合會關閉，自動調整的對應，但啟用擲回例外狀況機制當做安全措施。This combination of parameter settings turns best-fit mapping off, but enables the exception-throwing mechanism as a safety precaution. > [!CAUTION] > 您無法變更所提供的預設值時將傳遞 managed 的陣列的項目為 ANSI 字元或 LPSTRs 未受管理的安全陣列。You cannot change the default values provided by when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 永遠啟用自動調整的對應，而且可能會擲回任何例外狀況。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception can be thrown. 請注意這種組合可能會危害您的安全性模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何停用最適大小的對應，以及要的 Unicode 字元轉換時擲回例外狀況 '？ 'ANSI 字元。The following example shows how to disable best fit mapping and to throw an exception on the conversion of Unicode characters to the '?'
